title: New Holland LX865 Skid Steer: How to Flush Water-Contaminated Hydraulic Oil & Prevent Future Issues.

tasks.task: Troubleshoot and resolve water contamination in a New Holland hydraulic reservoir.
subtasks: Drain the hydraulic reservoir to remove contaminated oil.
Confirm the source of water ingress by inspecting the reservoir cap filters and potential gasket failures.
Replace faulty gaskets and apply silicone sealant at critical points (e.g., reservoir cap, breather filter cover).
Modify the reservoir cover with a custom plastic container and lid to prevent water accumulation.
Flush hydraulic lines to remove remaining contaminants and ensure proper fluid flow.
Install a new hydraulic filter to prevent future contamination.
Monitor the system post-repairs for proper performance and fluid clarity.
